title: Risk Premium process assembly with current system
snippet:
To do:
1. Create a “Warranty” category/tier
2. Make a button for Financials on the Dashboard
3. Create an Accounting tab in Individual Customer record
	- accounting tab for input and individual accounting balances and totals. input tab for input of warranty period, for money collected (10 input boxes) and start date of warranty = 12 input boxes
4. Integrate all existing elements and modify database and code as needed.
5. Provide detailed notes for any changes/modifications for regular team to integrate your work. Use GIT version control

Existing assets
1. database and structure
2. existing input/output tabs
	a. Premium matrix
	b. Schedule (income and liability)
3. customer module
